english: The above assertion is not idle speculation .
chinese: 以上的推断并非毫无根据。

english: I fail to see how you work it out .
chinese: 我看不出你是怎样推断出来的。

english: "you have spoken to him, i conclude. "
chinese: “我推断起来，你该和他谈过话的吧？”

english: But the other implication is not so easily proved .
chinese: 但是，相反的推断不是容易证明的。

english: We may reasonably conclude that the meeting has been postponed .
chinese: 我们可以推断会议推迟了。
推断造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I augur from all circumstances it is a prosperous voyage .
chinese: 从各种情况推断，我预料航行将会顺利。

english: If you put two and two together , there can be only one conclusion .
chinese: 根据事实推断，只可能有一个结论。

english: The statement and deduction in the first paragraph are imprecise .
chinese: 第一段中的陈述和推断是不尽确切的。

english: Beyond the obvious facts, i can deduce nothing else .
chinese: 除了这些显而易见的情况以外，我推断不出别的什么。

english: It should not be inferred that the science of mechanics began with newton .
chinese: 不应推断说力学是从牛顿开始的。

english: Let us attempt to infer some useful generalizations as we go .
chinese: 当我们这样作时，力图推断出某些有益的一般性结论。

english: Thoughtful men gathered from this that a plot was hatching .
chinese: 有头脑的人根据这种情况推断：必定有一个阴谋在酝酿中。

english: He tried to guess how the strata behaved at the time the contortions formed .
chinese: 他试图推断地层在扭曲形成时是如何变化的。

english: Is the rightness of actions inferable from the goodness of their consequences ?
chinese: 行为的正确从好的效果当中能推断出来吗？

english: We planned our 1983 models with the very rational assumption .
chinese: 我们在设计1983年的车型时，主要是根据这么一个很合理的推断。
